translation.en: [crowd chanting] Santi! Santi!
Santi! Santi! Santi!
[announcer] Yo, Miami!
On the first leg of his world tour,
translation.it: La prima tappa del suo tour mondiale!

translation.en: make some noise, y'all!
It's Santi!
Absolutely, so heavy.
-Honestly, the heaviest. -I couldn't have done it
-without my corillo! -[phone vibrates]
-Yo, Daddy Yankee! Dímelo, hermano. -[Daddy Yankee] Santi.
translation.it: - Ehi, Daddy Yankee! Dímelo, hermano. - Santi.

translation.en: -You're a star. -[girls tittering]
-Hey, I gotta call you right back. -Dale, papi.
Santi, we love you so much.
Let's all have sex,
together.
Santi, you can't. It's time.
Time for what?
You ladies can head back with me.
-It's time. Come on. -Ness!
What? We can share!
-We gotta go. We gotta go. Come on. -No.
Come on, Santi, wake up.
-Wake up. -[groaning]
-Wake up. It's time. -Bro, wake up.
-You don't wanna miss this. -Oh, I had the craziest dream.
translation.it: - Non vuoi perdertelo. - Che sogno assurdo.

translation.en: Tell me everything before we forget.
-Why do you guys do this? -[Felix] Ness,
I'm this young man's creative director,
and dreams are a creative director's clay, if you will.
translation.it: e i sogni sono l'argilla del direttore creativo, se permetti.

translation.en: -Do you will? -What?
-Do you will? -Okay, Felix,
as this young man's manager, shut the fuck up
translation.it: da manager, ti chiedo di chiudere la bocca

translation.en: and find a gas station like I've asked you to do.
-Yes, sorry. -Guys, we're so blessed.
I mean, we're moving to Miami. Like, this is it.
translation.it: Ci trasferiamo a Miami. È la volta buona.

translation.en: Oh, my God, not this again.
I gotta get you there in under an hour,
translation.it: Dobbiamo arrivare tra meno di un'ora

translation.en: to give us enough time to move into the apartment, to eat,
and get at least eight hours of beauty sleep
before the label meeting--
-Shit! -[man] …with his viral hit,
-with over six million views and counting… -[screams]
translation.it: con oltre sei milioni di visualizzazioni,

translation.en: -…"Exagerao," by Fort Myers' own, Santi. -[cheering]
-Let's go! -Hey, bro, you're on the radio!
-["Exagerao" playing] -I'm starstruck.
Guys, this is it. This is destiny!
-Yes! -Yeah!
[Ness] Yes!
♪ Frikitona, me lo puso de espaldas ♪
♪ No es el sol, pero quiero que salga Bandida ♪
It feels so good to finally not be a tourist in Miami.
translation.it: Finalmente siamo a Miami e non siamo turisti.

translation.en: -[Ness laughs] -Miami.
Oh, this is gonna be great.
-This is gonna be so great! -I--
Yo, we've been here five minutes, already seen your cousin Sebastian's ads.
translation.it: Siamo appena arrivati e c'è già la pubblicità di tuo cugino. LIFTIING SBAGLIATO? CHIAMA SEBASTIAN. PORTA IL CULO IN TRIBUNALE.

translation.en: He must be killing it with all the fucked-up BBLs here.
translation.it: Sarà ricco, con tutti i culi che rovinano qui.

translation.en: A botched BBL wouldn't be a dealbreaker for me.
translation.it: Un lifting sbagliato non è così male.

translation.en: It's like getting a discount on bruised fruit.
translation.it: Come ottenere lo sconto sulla frutta ammaccata.

translation.en: Still tastes the same.
[in Spanish] Should we take him out of the group?
But he's the best at what he does.
translation.it: È scemo, ma è il migliore nel suo lavoro.

translation.en: I know, I hate it.
translation.it: Lo so, e detesto questa cosa.

translation.en: [in English] Don't be bullies, cabrones.
-We're not bullying you. -I can tell by your tone.
translation.it: - Non siamo bulli. - Sento il tono.

translation.en: Yo, did… Did Mia's assistant confirm for tomorrow?
translation.it: L'assistente di Mia ha confermato per domani?

translation.en: Yeah. We're good. 11:30.
Yes! And she knows that all three of us are coming?
translation.it: Sì! E sa che andiamo tutti e tre?

translation.en: Just 'cause I don't have any experience,
translation.it: Non ho esperienza, ma non significa

translation.en: doesn't mean I don't know what I'm doing.
That's what that means. -[phone beeps] -[Santi] What?
"Thinking of the kids suffering in Africa and countries around the world."
translation.it: "Penso ai bambini che soffrono in Africa e in altri Paesi del mondo.

translation.en: "I do this for y'all."
You have alerts on for Javier Luna's Instagram?
translation.it: Hai le notifiche per i post di Javier Luna?

translation.en: You being jealous of Javier Luna, one of my favorites.
translation.it: Sei invidioso di Javier Luna, lo adoro.

translation.en: Also, his origin story is very fascinating.
translation.it: E la sua storia è affascinante.

translation.en: I'm not jealous of Javier. I'm just asking why does he have his alerts on?
translation.it: Non sono invidioso. Voglio sapere perché ha le notifiche.

translation.en: I don't get why people compare us.
That guy is like a reggaeton Machine Gun Kelly.
translation.it: Lui è un Machine Gun Kelly del reggaeton.

translation.en: He doesn't even write his own music.
What's wrong with MGK?
translation.it: Che ha che non va MGK?

translation.en: You at least have alerts on for my page, right?
translation.it: Hai le notifiche per la mia pagina, vero?

translation.en: Yeah.
How are you in charge of my social media page
translation.it: Gestisci la mia pagina sui social,

translation.en: but you only have alerts on for Javier Luna and not me?
translation.it: ma hai le notifiche per Javier Luna e non per me.

translation.en: Why do I need to have alerts on? I post things. I'm the alert.
translation.it: A che mi servono le notifiche? Sono io che posto.

translation.en: This is why I should be in charge of socials.
-You in charge of socials? -Yeah.
-Ness, you have two friends. -Yeah, so do you.
translation.it: - Ness, hai due amici. - Sì, come te.

translation.en: Who do you want running your Instagram?
translation.it: Chi deve gestire il tuo Instagram?

translation.en: Yo, Africa's not even a country.
It isn't, right?
-[Irma] There it is. This is it. -Ness.
[chuckling] This is not what was in the photos.
translation.it: Ness, non è come in foto.

translation.en: Relax, I got this.
This is not what was in the photos.
I know, but the pictures are old, very old.
translation.it: Lo so, ma le foto sono vecchie.

translation.en: I had it updated since.
Right.
Did anybody die in here?
I'm definitely feeling someone's ancestors.
It's not what we thought.
But this place is fine. It comes furnished, I mean…
It works.
Given this was a bait and switch,
obviously, we're gonna need some sort of discount.
There's gonna be an extra charge for the furniture.
translation.it: Se volete i mobili, dovete pagare un extra.

translation.en: That's the opposite of what I said.
translation.it: È l'opposto di quello che ho detto.

translation.en: Keep negotiating. You're doing great.
translation.it: Continua a negoziare. Vai alla grande.

translation.en: Extra. It has to be extra,
'cause I have to cover the furniture rental, the lease.
translation.it: per coprire l'affitto dei mobili, il noleggio.

translation.en: I have to pay for the beds, the couch, the table, the spoons.
translation.it: Devo pagare i letti, il divano, la tavola, i cucchiai.

translation.en: -Spoons? -[Santi] Look.
Even with the extra, guys, I mean, this is fine. We're…
translation.it: Anche con i costi extra, va bene. Siamo…

translation.en: We're in. It's a great deal.
Let's make it happen.
-It's a deal. -Perfect.
Eh, mmm, we'll take care of the paperwork.
It's gonna be two days to process and then you are in.
translation.it: Ci vorranno due giorni. Poi potrete trasferirvi.

translation.en: I thought that we were moving in today.
translation.it: Pensavo che ci saremmo trasferiti oggi.

translation.en: No, no, I didn't say today. I say two-day.
translation.it: No, non il giorno stesso. Ho detto dopo due giorni.

translation.en: -No, but we need to be in today. -No.
translation.it: - No, ma dobbiamo trasferirci oggi. - No.

translation.en: Can we please find another place?
Not that wouldn't blow our budget.
Okay, is there any way
that we can move in, maybe later this afternoon or maybe tonight?
translation.it: per trasferirci nel pomeriggio o magari stasera?

translation.en: Because we don't have anywhere else to go.
translation.it: Perché non abbiamo un altro posto.

translation.en: I feel like you didn't even think about that. You just said "no," real quick.
translation.it: Non ci ha nemmeno pensato. Ha detto subito: "No".

translation.en: -No. -That was the same speed.
No. Two days.
Come on, mami?
-Two days. -Two days.
Guys, it's really not that big of a deal.
We can get a motel until the place is ready.
I mean, that's one option, but also it's kind of not.
translation.it: È una possibilità, ma anche no.

translation.en: Why?
We're already spending way more than I thought on furniture,
translation.it: Stiamo già spendendo più del previsto per i mobili.

translation.en: and other than the money I set aside for studio time,
translation.it: A parte i soldi per lo studio di registrazione,

translation.en: we don't have extra.
We start spending, we start losing.
A motel means we lose, I don't know, a bed.
translation.it: Se andiamo in un motel, perdiamo un letto.

translation.en: Or spoons.
What about Sebastian? I bet his place is sick,
translation.it: E Sebastian? Avrà una bella casa,

translation.en: he's got that botched Brazilian booty bread.
translation.it: con quello che guadagna coi culi rovinati.

translation.en: Dude, there's no way that I'm calling Sebby.
That's admitting defeat before we even start.
He wants to help. He even offered you a job.
translation.it: Vuole aiutarti. Ti ha anche offerto un lavoro.

translation.en: If I call him, he's gonna call my dad, and start talking shit,
translation.it: Se lo chiamo, chiamerà mio padre e diranno cazzate.

translation.en: then my dad will call my tías and tíos
translation.it: E mio padre chiamerà le tías e i tíos

translation.en: and say that I should've fucking taken an office job just like them.
translation.it: e gli dirà che avrei dovuto lavorare in ufficio come loro.

translation.en: I don't want Sebby to know that I'm here.
translation.it: Non voglio che Sebby sappia che sono qui.

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do? I vote that we go back home.
translation.it: E cosa faremo? Io voto per tornare a casa.

translation.en: No. [sighs]
If we start driving back,
we can make it back in a couple of hours, beat traffic.
translation.it: saremo a casa tra due ore, non c'è traffico.

translation.en: [Santi] Big meeting tomorrow. Get some sleep.
Everybody good?
[Ness] Yes, perfect. I love this.
Ness, you're tall. Wouldn't you rather be somewhere spacious,
translation.it: Ness, sei alta. Non preferiresti un posto più spazioso

translation.en: like the trunk, or the undercarriage?
translation.it: come il baule o il telaio?

translation.en: Ow, what the fuck?
Santi, were you trying to fuck the landlady earlier?
translation.it: Santi, volevi farti la padrona di casa?

translation.en: Damn it.
-[Felix] Come on, park. -[Ness] We gotta move, we're running late.
translation.it: - Forza. Parcheggia. - Dobbiamo sbrigarci, è tardi.

translation.en: [Felix] All right, hurry up.
Do you really need your fucking backpack?
Guys, we only have ten minutes.
Ness, I can help you with your makeup.
We're all looking a little tired from last night.
I did my makeup already.
-Oh, I'm sure it's fine then. -I could kill you.
translation.it: - Allora diciamo che va bene. - Ti uccido.

translation.en: So, look, when Mia asks us to sign this record deal,
translation.it: Quando Mia ci chiederà di firmare questo contratto,

translation.en: do I say yes right away?
Or do I pretend like I'm thinking about it, and then be like,
translation.it: O faccio finta di pensarci un po' e poi le dico:

translation.en: -"Yeah, we'll sign." -[Ness] Okay, no.
She's not offering us a record deal.
She might not even help us.
We have to prepare for everything.
The only thing I'm preparing for
is filling our oceanfront balcony with hoes.
translation.it: a un balcone con vista oceano pieno di donne.

translation.en: Sorry, shouldn't have said that.
I'm trying new things. It's Miami.
translation.it: Sto provando a essere diverso. È Miami.

translation.en: Don't expect her to offer us anything.
If she did, that would be great. But we have a plan.
translation.it: Se le facesse, sarebbe fantastico. Ma c'è un piano.

translation.en: So remember the plan. We have this meeting,
translation.it: Ricordate il piano. Abbiamo questo meeting,

translation.en: we parlay that into other meetings,
then we network with DJ and industry types,
spend a little money to promote on some playlists
translation.it: spendiamo un po' per entrare nelle playlist

translation.en: once we figure out who's who,
build the hype, you record new music,
and then we start a bidding war between the record labels.
translation.it: e poi cominciamo una guerra di offerte tra case discografiche.

translation.en: Trust the plan.
So, trust the plan that has us
preparing for the meeting of our lives in a gas station bathroom?
translation.it: che prevede di lavarci nel bagno di un benzinaio?

translation.en: That is what I am here for. Music, plans.
translation.it: Io sono qui per questo. Musica, piani.

translation.en: It's not coming to mind
-what you're here for. -I'm the creative director.
translation.it: - perché ci sia tu. - Sono il direttore creativo.

translation.en: -The fuck? -[Ness] I don't really--
Stop it. We trust the plan, okay?
translation.it: Basta. Fidiamoci del piano, va bene?

translation.en: -That's why you're the captain. -Ya tú sabe.
[in English] No.
Is this sensor or is it a switch?
-Wait, wee bit higher. Up there. -No, hit it!
translation.it: - Aspetta. In alto. Lassù. - No, premilo.

translation.en: Don't hit it! Don't hit it!
Ah, it's so good to finally meet you.
-It's a pleasure. -[Mia laughs]
-And you must be Ness. -Yes.
-Nice to meet you. -You, too.
You must be Felix. I love how you directed the video.
translation.it: Felix. Adoro il video che hai diretto.

translation.en: -It's a pleasure to finally connect. -Okay.
We can't believe that we're meeting with someone from the biggest
translation.it: È incredibile. Stiamo parlando con qualcuno di una delle case

translation.en: -reggaeton label in the game. -Please.
translation.it: - più grandi per il reggaeton. - Oh.

translation.en: Okay.
-Come on, let's go find our table. -[Santi] Okay.
[softly] Calm down.
Okay, man, look, I just gotta say,
I am impressed with how you do it all.
translation.it: che mi piace che fai tutto.

translation.en: I mean, you… You write, you produce, you perform.
You know how rare that is in this space?
translation.it: Sai quant'è raro in questo campo?

translation.en: You have a real ear for it.
Oh, and the video?
Loved how y'all did the video.
translation.it: Adoro il video che avete fatto.

translation.en: -It was just-- -Thank you.
Of course.
Six million views is no joke.
I just love when people just go out there
translation.it: Mi piace quando ci si mette in gioco

translation.en: and figure shit out.
That's what you're supposed to do.
So, now, I have to ask, where do you see yourself going from here?
translation.it: Ora devo chiederti: qual è il tuo obiettivo?

translation.en: I mean, well, this might sound kind of crazy to you, but I feel like
translation.it: Sembrerà assurdo, ma io credo di poter diventare

translation.en: I can be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.it: la più grande star del reggaeton.

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound crazy at all.
If you could call my parents and tell them,
that would be great.
Yeah, I'll do it after I call mine.
I'll do it right after I call mine.
You wanna be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.it: Vuoi essere la più grande star del reggaeton.

translation.en: What's the next move?
Please tell me it's not that you moved here,
translation.it: Dimmi che non ti sei trasferito qui

translation.en: take a few meetings with some labels
translation.it: per fare dei meeting con case discografiche

translation.en: and were hoping they'd climb over each other to… [laughing] …sign you.
translation.it: sperando che avrebbero fatto a botte per offrirti un contratto.

translation.en: -No. -No.
Okay, good.
Of course not, no, um…
We have a really well-thought-out plan, and it's, uh, like, multifaceted.
translation.it: Abbiamo un piano preciso, con mille sfaccettature.

translation.en: I could explain it to you. It's just like--
-Eh, I got you. -Yeah.
It sounds intricate. I love that,
because not everybody has it figured out.
translation.it: perché non tutti trovano il modo.

translation.en: See that guy there?
The waiter?
He's a musician, too.
He's really good.
We had a meeting here a couple months ago at this exact same table.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto un meeting un paio di mesi fa, a questo tavolo.

translation.en: But it didn't work out the way he wanted it to.
translation.it: Ma non è andata come sperava.

translation.en: So now, he's here bringing people sandwiches.
translation.it: E ora porta i panini alla gente.

translation.en: So you specifically picked this restaurant
just to, like, point out that guy's failures?
No. What I'm trying to tell you is, that's every restaurant here.
translation.it: No. Voglio solo dirvi che ogni ristorante qui è così.

translation.en: That's the point.
I can't say this without sounding just a little bit slimy,
translation.it: Non posso dirlo senza sembrare un po' viscida,

translation.en: but the music industry is tough.
translation.it: ma il mondo della musica è duro.

translation.en: There's so many things new artists don't even know they don't even know.
translation.it: Ci sono tante cose che i nuovi artisti non sanno nemmeno.

translation.en: Market reports,
securing guest features and producers,
media promotions, tour scheduling. It's…
translation.it: promozione sui social, programmazione dei tour.

translation.en: I say that to say we have people to do all that shit for you.
translation.it: Abbiamo persone che fanno tutto questo per te.

translation.en: All you worry about is make some good music.
Great, that's what I do.
Plus, there's upfront money, too.
Yeah.
Yeah, there are a lot of uncertainties with being an independent artist.
translation.it: Sì, ci sono tante incertezze per un artista indipendente.

translation.en: But with being an independent artist, what you do know, uh,
translation.it: Ma essendo un artista indipendente è anche vero

translation.en: is nothing happens without your say-so.
translation.it: che niente accade se non lo vuoi.

translation.en: [chuckles] And I mean, yeah, that is a hell of a lot more work,
translation.it: Ed è un sacco di lavoro in più,

translation.en: but I don't see that as a bad thing.
translation.it: ma non credo che sia un male.

translation.en: Why would working harder be a bad thing, you know?
translation.it: Perché lavorare sodo dovrebbe essere brutto?

translation.en: Also, that is nothing to say of how whatever money you make
goes directly to you.
Can't argue with that.
Oh, shit.
I'm so sorry,
Um, I actually have to go.
-Wait. [laughs] -[Mia] Shit.
You're leaving? Right now?
[Mia] Yeah, I'm sorry.
My, uh, label is throwing this huge beach club event tonight
translation.it: La casa discografica ospita una festa in un beach club

translation.en: and I have to call all the artists.
Sounds fun.
Yes, it will be. Thank you guys so much for lunch. This was great.
translation.it: Lo sarà. Grazie per il pranzo. È stato fantastico.

translation.en: Yes, hi. Uh-huh.
You cannot bring him.
She didn't offer us a deal. Didn't invite us to the party.
translation.it: Niente contratto. Niente invito alla festa.

translation.en: Didn't even offer to pay for lunch.
translation.it: E non ha pagato il pranzo.

translation.en: Don't do that.
All I'm saying is it feels a lot like
translation.it: Dico solo che mi è sembrato

translation.en: Mia showed up feeling one way about us
and then you started spraying your Ness mist everywhere,
translation.it: e che, dopo che hai cominciato a diffondere la nebbia di Ness,

translation.en: then she left feeling a different way.
Who tells someone about a party, but doesn't invite them to it?
translation.it: Chi parla di una festa e non ti invita?

translation.en: Someone trying to send us a message.
Someone covered
-in Ness mist. -Stop saying that.
-It's gross. -For real,
what was going on back there? You started to go off script.
translation.it: che è successo? Sei andata fuori copione.

translation.en: I'm the manager, right?
I have to make sure that we make smart decisions.
It didn't all the way feel like that.
It felt like there was some subtext that Mia for sure noticed.
translation.it: È come se ci fosse del sottotesto che Mia ha notato.

translation.en: So you thought we had a good plan before, but now you don't?
translation.it: Prima ti piaceva il piano e ora hai cambiato idea?

translation.en: Diablo, it took one lunch meeting for you to trust somebody more than us.
translation.it: Diablo, un solo meeting e già non ti fidi più di me?

translation.en: I did not mean it like that. I'm just saying that
Mia, she started to say that our whole plan out here is shitty.
translation.it: che Mia ha detto che il nostro piano è una merda.

translation.en: -That didn't set off bells in your head? -That's literally
translation.it: - Non ti preoccupa? - Loro fanno così.

translation.en: what they do, it's a power game. She wants us to think we need her.
translation.it: È un gioco di potere. Vuole che abbiamo bisogno di lei.

translation.en: If I wasn't in this group, I would think it's hilarious
translation.it: Se non fossi uno del gruppo, troverei divertente

translation.en: how fucked we are. It took us one lunch meeting
translation.it: che siamo fregati. Un solo meeting

translation.en: for Ness to lose us our multimillion dollar record deal.
translation.it: e Ness ci ha fatto perdere un accordo multimilionario.

translation.en: There was no deal!
There was a deal. And you fucked it!
translation.it: Certo che sì. E hai rovinato tutto!

translation.en: You know what? Fuck it.
We gotta go to this party.
-The one Mia didn't invite us to? -[Ness] Yeah.
translation.it: - Quella a cui Mia non ci ha invitati? - Sì.

translation.en: We show her we're not some fucking loser wannabes.
translation.it: Le dimostriamo che non siamo dei perdenti.

translation.en: Ness, the three of us currently live in a 2009 Toyota Corolla.
translation.it: Ness, al momento, viviamo in una Toyota Corolla del 2009.

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. I'm gonna find that party and go there,
translation.it: Troverò la festa e ci andremo,

translation.en: and I'm going to get "Exagerao" played there.
It won't be listed online.
It's an industry event, not a college job fair.
-Found it. -Oh.
How did you find that?
Went to the label's site, found an employee registry,
translation.it: Ho trovato gli impiegati sul sito dell'etichetta,

translation.en: went to Instagram, looked for pictures, names.
translation.it: ho cercato su Instagram foto e nomi

translation.en: Then I checked if anyone had posted it,
translation.it: e ho visto se avevano postato,

translation.en: 'cause everybody posts everything.
translation.it: perché la gente posta di tutto.

translation.en: Wait.
Doesn't make sense.
It'll feel weird to show up there uninvited, like--
translation.it: Non mi sento a mio agio a presentarci senza invito…

translation.en: No, it's a straight-up bad idea.
At best, Mia is on the fence about a deal.
translation.it: Nel migliore dei casi, Mia era indecisa.

translation.en: If we show up to a party we're not even supposed to know about,
translation.it: Se andiamo a una festa di cui non dovremmo sapere niente,

translation.en: she'll think we're stalking her.
-It'll ruin our chance. -No. We should go.
Picture it. We are at the beach. Industry big shots
-are listening to your song-- -Yes.
translation.it: - che ascolta la tua canzone… - Sì.

translation.en: Yes, easy for you to say 'cause it's not your song.
translation.it: Per te è facile, non è la tua canzone.

translation.en: What if it doesn't go well? Then I'm a joke.
translation.it: E se non va bene? Sembrerò ridicolo.

translation.en: But you won't be.
Because you are gonna show them what I've known since I was 12 years old.
translation.it: Perché gli mostrerai quello che so da quando avevo 12 anni.

translation.en: And that is that you are a star.
This is the moment that we moved to Miami for.
We're supposed to be there.
Hey.
Going to this party?
It's our destiny.
-Yeah! -Now you're talking.
-Time to work your charm. -I got this.
translation.it: - Usa il tuo fascino. - Ci penso io.

translation.en: You got this. You're a big, strong man.
Listen, you probably get this every night, but it's just like,
translation.it: Senti, probabilmente ti capita ogni sera,

translation.en: literally just me and my beautiful friends--
translation.it: ma io e i miei fantastici amici…

translation.en: Santi? Love your video, man.
[in English] Come right in.
Wait. Stop right there.
We just gotta not be too conspicuous and blend in.
Holy fuck. Is that Jon Z?
[Ness] Oh, shit.
And is that Brray?
Nah. Everyone is at this party. I gotta go talk to them, Ness.
translation.it: No. Ci sono tutti a questa festa. Devo parlarci, Ness.

translation.en: What? No, that's the opposite of what I said.
translation.it: Come? No, è l'opposto di quello che ho detto.

translation.en: -It's my destiny! -No. [sputters]
I don't think he knows what conspicuous means.
translation.it: Non sa cosa significhi non farsi notare.

translation.en: -How did you-- -What's up? We figured it out.
translation.it: - Come… - Come va? Abbiamo trovato il modo.

translation.en: -You did. -You said earlier
you're most interested in people who figure things out.
translation.it: ti interessa chi trova il modo.

translation.en: So Ness, she figured some stuff out and here we are.
translation.it: Ness ha trovato il modo ed eccoci qui.

translation.en: -Here you are. -[Ness] Here we are.
What's new with you?
-Nothing since today. -Good.
translation.it: - Niente è cambiato da oggi. - Bene.

translation.en: I wanna introduce to you the next big thing in reggaeton.
translation.it: Voglio presentarvi la prossima star del reggaeton.

translation.en: My friend, mi hermano, con ustedes, Javier Luna!
translation.it: Il mio amico, mi hermano, con ustedes, Javier Luna!

translation.en: We signed Javier Luna couple of months ago.
translation.it: Ha firmato un contratto un paio di mesi fa.

translation.en: He's great, right?
I never heard of him.
You know, that could be you up there.
All right, guys, have fun.
I'm gonna go out and mingle.
You guys are really here.
What kind of look was that?
Was that like, "I respect your hustle" look
or was that, "you super overstepped" look?
That was good. That was a good look.
No, it was bad.
I'm gonna get a drink.
Yo.
I need to know something.
You started pushing being independent at the meeting,
translation.it: Hai parlato di essere indipendente, al meeting,

translation.en: sort of out of nowhere, and honestly, I look around at this party
translation.it: all'improvviso. Onestamente, quel che vedo a questa festa

translation.en: and it doesn't seem that terrible.
Signing a deal with Mia, if it's a good one,
translation.it: Firmare un accordo con Mia, se è buono,

translation.en: is the best thing.
-Right. -And I hope that
she does offer it.
And I hope that we didn't actually fuck it up today. I just… [laughs]
translation.it: E spero che non abbiamo rovinato niente.

translation.en: You clearly vibed with her.
Right? And professionally,
she is the better version of what I'm supposed to be,
translation.it: è una versione migliore di quella che dovrei essere io.

translation.en: and I don't know, I bet everything on this too,
translation.it: E non so, anch'io ci ho scommesso tutto

translation.en: and I just kept seeing this thing in my head of me getting pushed out.
translation.it: e continuo a immaginare di essere cacciata dal progetto.

translation.en: Of course, I think she's cool and she knows her shit,
translation.it: È una tipa a posto e sa il fatto suo,

translation.en: but, like, you're like my fucking sister, bro.
translation.it: ma tu sei come una sorella, cazzo.

translation.en: I'm still at home working for my parents if it's not for you.
translation.it: Se non fosse per te, sarei a casa a lavorare con i miei.

translation.en: You see things that I don't,
translation.it: Vedi cose che io non vedo

translation.en: in people, in situations, in myself.
translation.it: nella gente, nelle situazioni, in me stesso.

translation.en: So, I mean, what are you seeing right now?
Dímelo, ¿qué tú quieres hacer? You wanna go?
What are you feeling?
I guess I'm feeling like, I mean, it is a party,
translation.it: Penso che questa è una festa

translation.en: and we are in Miami.
And there are a lot of cuties here we can talk to.
translation.it: Ci sono tante ragazze carine con cui parlare.

translation.en: Throw on your Ness swag
translation.it: Tira fuori il fascino alla Ness

translation.en: and go bag yourself a cutie, okay?
-You want me to wingman you? -No, I do not.
Uh, Mr. Z y Mr. Brray.
I mean, I don't even know what to call you.
Papi, just call me Bambi, Bambini,
Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta, or Brray, bro.
translation.it: Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta, o Bryan.

translation.en: A'ight, I'mma just stick with Brray. [laughs]
translation.it: Va bene, continuo a chiamarti Brray.

translation.en: Yo, listen, I just wanna say that, like,
I'm a huge fan of your work
translation.it: che sono un grande fan del vostro lavoro

translation.en: and I think that you guys are just incredible, man.
Where do I know you from, bro?
translation.it: Dov'è che ti ho già visto?

translation.en: I'm a reggaeton artist. My name is Santi.
translation.it: Sono un artista di reggaeton. Mi chiamo Santi.

translation.en: Oh, yeah… El video ese de "Exagerao."
-"Exagerao." -That's a banger, bro.
-You got real talent. -Thank you, bro. You, too.
translation.it: - Hai del talento. - Grazie. Anche tu.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
[all] It's destiny!
Yo! It's his song! It's his song!
We're getting a record deal, baby!
What's up?
It was a good look, guys.
Oscar Morales's office.
No, this is his assistant, Mia.
translation.it: No, sono la sua assistente, Mia.

translation.en: Okay, I'll pass that message along. Okay, bye.
translation.it: Va bene, gli riferirò il messaggio. Sì, arrivederci.

translation.en: [Oscar] Mia, my coffee, please! And where's my dry-cleaning?
translation.it: Mia, il caffè, per favore! E il mio bucato?

translation.en: It just got here.
